Description:
Detects the executiob of TTDInject.exe, which is used by Windows 10 v1809 and newer to debug time travel (underlying call of tttracer.exe)

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Use of TTDInject.exe
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%ttdinject.exe' and original_file_name = 'ttdinject.exe'
